duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivering Manufacturing Skill Certifications to all levels of LM personnel and maintaining course delivery traceability within the Learning Management System.
Experience in delivering industry certification courses, previous or current certification as an IPC or NASA Instructor, as well as experience within an electronics manufacturing environment.
Proficiency with Microsoft office is preferred.
Prior experience with Instructional System Design and SAP is preferred but not required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education or a related field (certifications preferred)
